00040                 public function index()
00041                 {
00042                         if (!empty($_REQUEST['id']))
00043                         {
00044                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'read',
00045                                 'id' => $_REQUEST['id']));
00046                         }
00047                         // A static class method would be infinitely better...
00048                         $article = new DiarioPost();
00049                         $this->articles = $article->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`status` = 'pubblicato'", 'order_by' => '`created_at` DESC', 'limit' => '10', 'start' => @$_REQUEST['start']));
00050 
00051                         if (isset($_REQUEST['layout']) &&
00052                                 $_REQUEST['layout'] == 'false')
00053                         {
00054                                 $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00055                         }

00073                 public function tag()
00074                 {
00075                         if (empty($_REQUEST['id']))
00076                         {
00077                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00078                         }
00079                         // A static class method would be infinitely better...
00080                         $tag = new Tag();
00081                         $tag->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']);
00082                         $tag->has_and_belongs_to_many('diario_posts', array('order_by' => '`created_at` DESC'));
00083                         $this->articles = $tag->diario_posts;
00084                         usort($this->articles, array($this->articles[0], 'sort_posts'));
00085 
00086                         if (count($this->articles) > 10)
00087                         {
00088                                 $start = limit_3(@$_REQUEST['start'], 0, count($this->articles) - 1);
00089                                 $this->articles = array_slice($this->articles, $start, 10);
00090                         }
00091 
00092                         $this->render(array('action' => 'index'));
00093                 }

00108                 public function date()
00109                 {
00110                         if (!empty($_REQUEST['day']))
00111                         {
00112                                 $the_time = mktime(0, 0, 0, $_REQUEST['month'], $_REQUEST['day'] + 1, $_REQUEST['year']);
00113                         }
00114                         else
00115                         {
00116                                 if (!empty($_REQUEST['month']))
00117                                 {
00118                                         $the_time = mktime(0, 0, 0, $_REQUEST['month'] + 1, 1, $_REQUEST['year']);
00119                                 }
00120                                 else
00121                                 {
00122                                         $the_time = mktime(0, 0, 0, 1, 1, $_REQUEST['year'] + 1);
00123                                 }
00124                         }
00125                         $the_date = date("Y-m-d H:i:s", $the_time);
00126                         $article = new DiarioPost();
00127                         $this->articles = $article->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`created_at` < '{$the_date}' AND `status` = 'pubblicato' ", 'order_by' => '`created_at` DESC', 'limit' => '10', 'start' => @$_REQUEST['start']));
00128 
00129                         if (isset($_REQUEST['layout']) &&
00130                                 $_REQUEST['layout'] == 'false')
00131                         {
00132                                 $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE, 'action' => 'index'));
00133                         }
00134                         else
00135                         {
00136                                 $this->render(array('action' => 'index'));
00137                         }
00138                 }

00145                 public function live_search()
00146                 {
00147                         if (isset($_REQUEST['term']) && !empty($_REQUEST['term']))
00148                         {
00149                                 $conn = Db::get_connection();
00150 
00151                                 $post_factory = new DiarioPost();
00152 
00153                                 $terms = explode(' ', $_REQUEST['term']);
00154 
00155                                 $where_clause = '1';
00156                                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($terms); $i++)
00157                                 {
00158                                         $where_clause .= " AND (`title` LIKE '%{$conn->escape($terms[$i])}%' OR " .
00159                                                 "`author` LIKE '%{$conn->escape($terms[$i])}%' OR " .
00160                                                 "`text` LIKE '%{$conn->escape($terms[$i])}%') ";
00161                                 }
00162 
00163                                 $this->search_results = $post_factory->find_by_query("SELECT * " .
00164                                         "FROM `diario_posts` " .
00165                                         "WHERE {$where_clause} " .
00166                                         "AND `status` = 'pubblicato' LIMIT 20");
00167 
00168                                 Db::close_connection($conn);
00169 
00170                                 if (count($this->search_results) > 0)
00171                                 {
00172                                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00173                                 }
00174                         }
00175                         $this->render(array('action' => 'no_results', 'layout' => FALSE));
00176                 }

00197                                                 "`text` LIKE '%{$conn->escape($terms[$i])}%') ";
00198                                 }
00199 
00200                                 $this->articles = $post_factory->find_by_query("SELECT * " .
00201                                         "FROM `diario_posts` " .
00202                                         "WHERE {$where_clause} " .
00203                                         "AND `status` = 'pubblicato' LIMIT 20");
00204                                 if (count($this->articles) < 1)
00205                                 {
00206                                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));

00208 
00209                                 Db::close_connection($conn);

00212                         }

00215                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));

00223                 public function read()
00224                 {
00225                         if (empty($_REQUEST['id']))
00226                         {
00227                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00228                         }
00229 
00230                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00231 
00232                         /*
00233                         // THIS SUCKS!!!
00234                         $this->article = DiarioPost::find($_REQUEST['id'], 'DiarioPost');
00235                         */
00236                         $this->article = new DiarioPost();
00237                         if ($this->article->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']) === FALSE)
00238                         {
00239                                 $this->flash(l('No such article'), 'error');
00240                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00241                         }
00242                         if ($this->article->status != 'pubblicato')
00243                         {
00244                                 HTTP::error(404);
00245                         }
00246 
00247                         // Annotates that the article has been read
00248                         $this->article->readings++;
00249                         $this->article->save();
00250 
00251                         $this->render(array('layout' => 'diario_read'));
00252 
00253                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00254                 }

00275                 public function go() {
00276                         $this->article = new DiarioPost();
00277                         if ($this->article->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']) === FALSE)
00278                         {
00279                                 $this->flash(l('No such article'), 'error');
00280                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00281                         }
00282                         if ($this->article->status != 'pubblicato' ||
00283                                 $this->article->external_url == NULL)
00284                         {
00285                                 HTTP::error(404);
00286                         }
00287 
00288                         // Annotates that the article has been read
00289                         $this->article->readings++;
00290                         $this->article->save();
00291 
00292                         header(sprintf('Location: %s', $this->article->external_url));
00293                         exit();
00294                 }

00300                 public function post_comment()
00301                 {
00302                         if (!$this->request->is_post())
00303                         {
00304                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00305                         }
00306                         $post = new DiarioPost();
00307                         if ($post->find_by_id($_POST['post_id']) === FALSE)
00308                         {
00309                                 $this->flash(l('No such article'), 'error');
00310                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00311                         }
00312 
00313                         if (!Email::is_valid($_POST['email']))
00314                         {
00315                                 $this->flash(l('Please enter a valid email address'), 'error');
00316                                 $this->redirect_to($post->permalink(FALSE));
00317                         }
00318                         if (!Antispam::check_math())
00319                         {
00320                                 $this->flash(Antispam::random_comment(), 'error');
00321                                 $this->redirect_to($post->permalink(FALSE));
00322                         }
00323                         // A static class method would be infinitely better...
00324                         $comment = new DiarioComment($_POST);
00325                         $comment->created_at = date("Y-m-d H:i:s");
00326                         $comment->save();
00327 
00328                         // Send an email to notify this comment
00329                         $email = new DiarioCommentEmail(array('comment' => $comment,
00330                                 'name' => $_POST['author'],
00331                                 'email' => $_POST['email'],
00332                                 'URL' => $_POST['URL']));
00333                         $email->send();
00334 
00335                         if (isset($_POST['remember_me']))
00336                         {
00337                                 $this->set_credentials($_POST['author'],
00338                                         $_POST['email'],
00339                                         $_POST['URL']);
00340                         }
00341 
00342                         // Expires the cache
00343                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('action' => 'index'));
00344                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('action' => 'read', 'id' => $_POST['post_id']));
00345                         // Expires the cache of Comments feed
00346                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'feed', 'action' => 'diario_comments', 'id' => $_POST['post_id']));
00347 
00348                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'read', 'id' => $_POST['post_id'], 'hash' => "comment-{$comment->id}"));
00349                 }

00355                 protected function init_math_test()
00356                 {
00357                         Antispam::init_math_test();

00364                 protected function highlight_words()
00365                 {
00366                         if (isset($_REQUEST['term']) && !empty($_REQUEST['term']))
00367                         {
00368                                 if (($pos = strpos($this->response->body, '<body')) !== FALSE)
00369                                 {
00370                                         $head = substr($this->response->body, 0, $pos);
00371                                         $tail = substr($this->response->body, $pos);
00372 
00373                                         $tail = preg_replace(
00374                                                 "/>([^<]*)({$_REQUEST['term']})/ie",
00375                                                 "'>\\1'.span('\\2',array('class'=>'highlighted'))",
00376                                                 $tail);
00377 
00378                                         $this->response->body = $head . $tail;
00379 
00380                                 }
00381                         }
00382                 }
00383         }
